GitHub

Beginning interactivity

This week we will learn about ipywidgets and traitlets and apply them to visualizations in Python.

Optional Reading List

  1. Intro to ipywidgets
  2. Example Widgets Notebooks
  3. VAD Ch. 7: Arrange Tables
  4. FDV, Ch. 7: Visualizing distributions: Histograms and density plots

Lectures

Lecture 4 - Widgets & Traitlets for Interactivity

We talk about the basics of using Traitlets and data binding in visualization.

Data

The UFO Sitings Dataset (13Mb)

Data about world wide reports of UFO sitings

Michigan Depth Map (86Mb)

Measurments taken from around Lake Michigan (https://www.ngdc.noaa.gov/mgg/greatlakes/michigan.html)
